title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not selected on the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view. Subsequent attempts to select the item are successful. This issue occurs consistently in the outline view of the library.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view for the first time.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and marked as selected on the first attempt. The focus should remain on the selected item and not jump to the library file node.

Observed Behavior: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view and the item is not selected on the first attempt. The item can only be selected on subsequent attempts.
OB: The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view and the item is not selected on the first attempt. The item can only be selected on subsequent attempts.
EB: The selected item should be highlighted and marked as selected on the first attempt. The focus should remain on the selected item and not jump to the library file node.
